environment_variables.PBS_O_HOST: host on which qsub was run
environment_variables.PBS_O_LOGNAME: name of user who submitted the job
environment_variables.PBS_O_HOME: absolute path of the home directory of the user who submitted the job
environment_variables.PBS_O_WORKDIR: absolute path from which the job was submitted
environment_variables.PBS_O_QUEUE: name of the scheduling queue to which the job was submitted
environment_variables.PBS_SERVER: name of the host to which qsub submitted the job
environment_variables.PBS_QUEUE: name of the scheduling queue from which the job is being run
environment_variables.PBS_JOBID: unique job number assigned by the scheduler
environment_variables.PBS_NODEFILE: filename containing the names of nodes assigned to the job
environment_variables.PBS_ARRAYID: array identifier for this sub-job within an array job
environment_variables.TMPDIR: absolute path of temp directory on the assigned node's local disk (not GPFS) -- not provided by ACCRE!
